abilities.description: Allows the user to stitch anything together with a needle, including living beings to surfaces or objects. The stitches are extremely strong and difficult to break.
abilities.limitations: Requires physical contact with a needle to create stitches. The stitches can theoretically be cut or torn with sufficient force.
abilities.strengths: Extremely versatile for restraining opponents, repairing objects, or performing medical procedures. Can pierce through extremely hard materials including metal.

abilities.description: An advanced technique that allows the user to stitch multiple objects or people together simultaneously with extreme force.
abilities.limitations: Requires precise control and multiple targets
abilities.strengths: Can restrain multiple powerful opponents at once

keyMoments.title: Nui Nui no Mi First Demonstration
keyMoments.description: Leo demonstrates the power of the Nui Nui no Mi by revealing he has sewn Robin to the ground, preventing her from escaping the Tontatta Kingdom.
keyMoments.significance: First reveal of this unique Devil Fruit's abilities and its practical applications for restraining enemies.

reveals.information: The Nui Nui no Mi grants the power to stitch anything together
Leo of the Tontatta Tribe possesses the Nui Nui no Mi
Can sew people to surfaces making escape nearly impossible

weaknesses.weakness: Standard Devil Fruit weaknesses (sea water, Seastone)
Stitches can potentially be cut or forcibly broken

trivia.fact: The Nui Nui no Mi's design features multiple colored patches stitched together, reflecting its sewing theme.
Despite Leo's small size as a dwarf, his Devil Fruit ability can restrain even large humans effectively.
